questList.questDescription: The Whispering Shadows are haunted by the spirits of the lost souls. Your task is to either unite with Spectra the Shadowed Wraith or defeat Netheral the Ethereal Revenant to proceed to the next level.
The balance in the Whispering Shadows is fragile. Bring peace by uniting with Phantasmal Legionnaires and receive an amulet of healing as a reward.
The Void-touched Spectres pose a threat to the realm. Eliminate Nihilus the Voidspawned Horror to earn an amulet of alliance.
The Ethereal Twilight is guarded by powerful entities. Choose to either unite with Rustscale the Corroded Guardian or defeat Pyris the Flame Guardian to advance to the next level.
The flames in the Ethereal Twilight hold healing properties. Unite with Spectrus the Chain Specter to receive an amulet of healing.
The Emberstone Golems must be vanquished to secure the alliance. Defeat Scorchius the Ember Elemental to gain an amulet of alliance.
The ultimate challenge awaits in Void's Embrace. Confront Zyphraxus the Soul Wraith, the Ethereal Void Stalker, to claim victory and pass this level.
The shadows in Void's Embrace can be harnessed for healing. Unite with Abyssal the Voidwalker to receive an amulet of healing.
The Abyssal Phantasms must be shattered to forge an alliance. Defeat Shadeclaw the Phantasmal Horror to earn an amulet of alliance.
